Trade/Device Name(s): VARIANT II TURBO Hemoglobin Testing System
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): VARIANT II TURBO Hemoglobin Testing System
Personal computer with Clinical Data Management (CDM) software
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Bio-Rad VARIANT II TURBO HbA1c Kit - 2.0 for quantitative determination of hemoglobin A1c in human whole blood using HPLC.
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for the quantitative determination of hemoglobin A1c in human whole blood using HPLC on the VARIANT II TURBO Hemoglobin Testing System to monitor long-term glycemic control in individuals with diabetes mellitus; for professional use only.
